name: cinemas_id_showtimes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool argentina_movie_theatres.
Tool description: This api will give you data about the movies and showtimes of the 3 main theatre chains in Argentina
API description: Fetches the showtimes for a specified cinema and optionally filters by a given film.

filmid.description: The film identifier to filter showtimes. Defaults to None.
